amendment.description: To provide for a report to Congress on the Homeland Security Advisory System, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1344 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1344 proposed by Senator Lautenberg. (consideration: CR S9767-9769; text: CR S9767) To provide for a report to Congress on the Homeland Security Advisory System, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1344 proposed by Senator Lautenberg.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1344 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
